evidence.claim: CorroHealth is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of health data.
The company utilizes FHIR standards for health data exchange.
CorroHealth supports X12 EDI standards for insurance claims processing.
The company emphasizes data security in accordance with health regulations.

icp.icp_reason: CorroHealth focuses on EDI solutions and claims processing that align with X12 transactions.
